data.text: And we should treat Mac the same fucking way. It’s not about her or them. Today it is about HIM. He was such an absolute genius and an amazing soul. We’ll fucking miss you, man.

Another thing is he is NOT “Ariana Grande’s ex”. He’s Malcolm McCormick, Mac Miller, Larry Lovestien. He has a fucking name, okay? Ariana grande said once “I’m not Big Sean’s ex, I’m not Niall’s possible new girl. I’m Ariana grande and if that’s not enough, don’t talk to me.”

They broke up because no one should be in a toxic relationship. It was okay for her to leave, it’s okay for her to fall in love with someone else. And I’m SURE it hurt Mac, but that doesn’t mean he overdosed because of her. Real fans will know he’s ALWAYS struggled with drugs.
